name: AxalentSmartHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on red light.”
”Alexa, turn off red light.”
”Alexa, turn on light1.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
This skill requires an Axalent DevKit along with an Axalent Account. The DevKit is meant for developers at consumer products companies to allow them to gain familiarity with the Axalent platform and tools.

You can ask Alexa the following: “Alexa, …”
- turn on red light.
- turn off red light.
- turn on light1.
- turn off light1.
